item.title: Help making a command
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

oh sorry

add a ; at the end of it so it looks like this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("own") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("why do you need this ring noob cant you win without it?"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+" is a NOOB who needs extra bonuses!!!"); addItem(775, 1); }
its fixed lolz sorry bout that

Read full topic

item.title: Help making a command
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("own") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("why do you need this ring noob cant you win without it?") PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+" is a NOOB who needs extra bonuses!!!"); addItem(775, 1); }

im pretty sure thats right…

put it under

/END OF FRAME TESTING/

oh btw you had this

sendMessage(“PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+” is a NOOB who needs extra bonuses!!!");");
^
sends to only that player

thats not right… it can either be

sendMessage(playerName+" is a noob who needs extra bonuses!!!");

or

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+" is a NOOB who needs extra bonuses!!!");
^
sends to everyone

`metal

Read full topic

item.title: Help making a command
item.dc:creator: @Lexii Lexii
item.description:
@Lexii wrote:

if (command.startsWith("::own"))
{
sendMessage(“PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+” is a NOOB who needs extra bonuses!!!");");
addItem(775, 1);
}
ok thats the command i created… i want to make it for player rights 2 only
and where do i add it?
itput it in commands but none of the other commands r there… and they work… and it doesnt even work

i tried putin it in client but got 100 errors on compile and run lmao so i dleted… where do i put it?and how do i make it for player rights 2 only

Read full topic

item.title: Help making a command
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

the plus goes where ever the text is around it
say you want it to look like this

sendMessage("welcome back to SERVERNAME "+playerName+" have a good time");

or this

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+" is a noob who has tried to be a noob and is now banned");

and finally if its at the end of the sentance it lookks like this

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("omg hurry theres a player at the mage bank omg its "+playerName)

hope that helps

`metal

Read full topic
